What a beatiful view and time to make a Cobbler LOL 

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:          I try to do a bike ride on Saturdays, usually 30 to 40miles. This is where I 
usually go, once around the Lake to get 30 miles, twice for 40 miles. That 
includes the distance from home and back. This is looking south, toward 
along the foot hills of the Rockies. The Choke Cherries are just getting 
ripe, so I brough back maybe four pounds that I picked along the bike trail.

Frank-S

"Nature is showing us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even though, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at once."

"What you're feeling right now -all the rage and frustration binding everything from your head to your digestive tract- that's my life with you."
Rube - Dead Like Me


"There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL
